description: An international scientific meeting bringing together researchers, academics, industry professionals, and postgraduate scholars to discuss digital transformation across pharmaceutical and related sciences.
submissionGuidelines: Maximum 300 words in Times New Roman, 12 pt, single spacing.
Include: Title, Author(s), Affiliation, Background/Rationale, Objectives, Methods, Results, Conclusion, and up to 5 keywords.
Accepted abstracts will be published in the MyCite-indexed International Journal of Pharmaceuticals, Nutraceuticals and Cosmetic Science (IJPNaCS).
